TaskDescription.Detail: Store a value in a variable and write it on Notepad.

Assist.value: This activity launches Notepad. Check the variable(processID) created in advance in the variables window.
Double-click the property field and select this.processID.
This activity stores a value in a variable. Check the variable(var1) created in advance in the variables window.
Double-click the property field and select this.var1.
This activity enter a value stored in a variable into Notepad.
Type this.var1 in the property field.
This activity closes Notepad using process ID.
Double-click the property field and select this.processID.
